title: New ebook packs for ALL of 2015 Part 1
description:
These are the original daily ebook packs released by the group known as The NERDs

SEE THE INCLUDED INDEX TEXT FILES FOR CONTENTS OF THIS & ALL PREVIOUS TORRENTS
SEE THE INCLUDED LINKS ZIP FILE FOR ALL PREVIOUS TORRENT FILES & MAGNETS

A list of the complete collection, 2003 to date, is also included for reference.You can view these files quickly by setting them to Priority High.

If you arenâ€™t familiar with NERDs ebooks, sample a single day from a smaller, more recent torrent by setting other files in the torrent to Priority â€œdo not downloadâ€.

The complete collection contains hundreds of thousands of ebooks, is over 500GB RARâ€™d, would be double that otherwise and will not be posted in any other format.  Everything about these torrents is done for a reason, not without thought.  The RAR file naming convention is purposely to evade DMCA crawlers.

These torrents are an expression of appreciation to the NERDs for making all these wonderful ebooks available, providing missing and broken files as needed and giving me their blessing to redistribute them here.

Either youâ€™re familiar with NERDs ebooks and delighted at the opportunity to back fill your collection, or youâ€™re lucky enough to discover them now while theyâ€™re still available, or you can whine and complain and miss the boat. Your choice.

Enjoy

PS. Thanks to everyone for all the nice comments and feedback on earlier torrents and a special thanks to everyone that has contributed their bandwidth and resources to help seed.  Another special thanks to all the Nerds for all their hard work creating and releasing these daily RAR packs.

          ------------------------------------------

TO COMBINE YOUR INDIVIDUAL MONTH TORRENTS INTO A FULL YEAR TORRENT:

1 Download this yearly magnet or torrent and then stop it.
2 Stop all of the monthly torrents for that year, complete and incomplete.
3 In Windows explorer, move the JAN thru DEC RAR files from the monthly torrent folders into this ALL for year torrent folder, overwriting.
4 Force a recheck of the new torrent, it should now be greater than 0%
5 Queue it
